tool_description: Predicts future demand for products using historical sales data, seasonality patterns, and market trends.

historical_sales_data.description: Historical sales volumes in chronological order

forecast_horizon_days.description: Number of days ahead to forecast

seasonality_pattern.description: Seasonality pattern: auto, weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly

external_factors.description: External factors to consider: holiday, promotion, weather, economic

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: need at least 30 data points for reliable forecasting
Invalid forecast horizon: forecast_horizon_days must be between 1 and 365
Invalid seasonality pattern: use auto, weekly, monthly, quarterly, or yearly
Confidence level out of range: confidence_level must be between 0.5 and 0.99
Data quality issues: historical_sales_data contains invalid or missing values
usage: Provide product_id, historical_sales_data array, and forecast_horizon_days. Optionally specify seasonality_pattern, external_factors, and confidence_level for more accurate predictions.

forecasted_demand.description: Predicted demand values for each day in forecast horizon

forecast_accuracy.description: Estimated accuracy score of the forecast

trend_direction.description: Overall trend direction: increasing, decreasing, stable
